Source code for pyqtguii

from PyQt5.QtWidgets import (
    QApplication, QWidget, QLabel, QLineEdit, QPushButton, QVBoxLayout, QComboBox, QTableWidget, QTableWidgetItem, QMessageBox
)
from student import Student
from instructor import Instructor
from course import Course
import sys




[docs]
class SchoolManagementGUI(QWidget):
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()

        self.setWindowTitle('School Management System - PyQt5')
        self.students = []
        self.instructors = []
        self.courses = []

        self.initUI()



[docs]
    def initUI(self):
        # Layout
        self.layout = QVBoxLayout()

        # Widgets for Students
        self.student_name_label = QLabel('Student Name')
        self.student_name_input = QLineEdit(self)

        self.student_age_label = QLabel('Age')
        self.student_age_input = QLineEdit(self)

        self.student_email_label = QLabel('Email')
        self.student_email_input = QLineEdit(self)

        self.student_id_label = QLabel('Student ID')
        self.student_id_input = QLineEdit(self)

        self.register_course_label = QLabel('Register for Course')
        self.course_combobox = QComboBox(self)

        self.add_student_button = QPushButton('Add Student', self)
        self.add_student_button.clicked.connect(self.add_student)

        # Adding widgets to the layout
        self.layout.addWidget(self.student_name_label)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.student_name_input)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.student_age_label)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.student_age_input)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.student_email_label)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.student_email_input)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.student_id_label)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.student_id_input)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.register_course_label)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.course_combobox)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.add_student_button)

        # Table to display students
        self.student_table = QTableWidget(self)
        self.student_table.setColumnCount(5)
        self.student_table.setHorizontalHeaderLabels(['Name', 'Age', 'Email', 'ID', 'Courses'])
        self.layout.addWidget(self.student_table)

        # Widgets for Instructors
        self.instructor_name_label = QLabel('Instructor Name')
        self.instructor_name_input = QLineEdit(self)

        self.instructor_age_label = QLabel('Age')
        self.instructor_age_input = QLineEdit(self)

        self.instructor_email_label = QLabel('Email')
        self.instructor_email_input = QLineEdit(self)

        self.instructor_id_label = QLabel('Instructor ID')
        self.instructor_id_input = QLineEdit(self)

        self.add_instructor_button = QPushButton('Add Instructor', self)
        self.add_instructor_button.clicked.connect(self.add_instructor)

        # Adding widgets to the layout
        self.layout.addWidget(self.instructor_name_label)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.instructor_name_input)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.instructor_age_label)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.instructor_age_input)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.instructor_email_label)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.instructor_email_input)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.instructor_id_label)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.instructor_id_input)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.add_instructor_button)

        # Table to display instructors
        self.instructor_table = QTableWidget(self)
        self.instructor_table.setColumnCount(4)
        self.instructor_table.setHorizontalHeaderLabels(['Name', 'Age', 'Email', 'ID'])
        self.layout.addWidget(self.instructor_table)

        # Widgets for Courses
        self.course_id_label = QLabel('Course ID')
        self.course_id_input = QLineEdit(self)

        self.course_name_label = QLabel('Course Name')
        self.course_name_input = QLineEdit(self)

        self.assign_instructor_label = QLabel('Assign Instructor')
        self.instructor_combobox = QComboBox(self)

        self.add_course_button = QPushButton('Add Course', self)
        self.add_course_button.clicked.connect(self.add_course)

        # Adding widgets to the layout
        self.layout.addWidget(self.course_id_label)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.course_id_input)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.course_name_label)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.course_name_input)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.assign_instructor_label)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.instructor_combobox)
        self.layout.addWidget(self.add_course_button)

        # Table to display courses
        self.course_table = QTableWidget(self)
        self.course_table.setColumnCount(3)
        self.course_table.setHorizontalHeaderLabels(['ID', 'Course Name', 'Instructor'])
        self.layout.addWidget(self.course_table)

        # Set the layout
        self.setLayout(self.layout)





[docs]
    def add_student(self):
        name = self.student_name_input.text()
        age = self.student_age_input.text()
        email = self.student_email_input.text()
        student_id = self.student_id_input.text()
        selected_course_name = self.course_combobox.currentText()

        selected_course = None
        for course in self.courses:
            if course.course_name == selected_course_name:
                selected_course = course
                break

        try:
            student = Student(name, int(age), email, student_id)
            if selected_course:
                student.register_course(selected_course)
                selected_course.add_student(student)
            self.students.append(student)
            self.refresh_student_table()
            QMessageBox.information(self, 'Success', f'Student {name} added successfully!')
        except ValueError as e:
            QMessageBox.critical(self, 'Error', str(e))





[docs]
    def add_instructor(self):
        name = self.instructor_name_input.text()
        age = self.instructor_age_input.text()
        email = self.instructor_email_input.text()
        instructor_id = self.instructor_id_input.text()

        try:
            instructor = Instructor(name, int(age), email, instructor_id)
            self.instructors.append(instructor)
            self.refresh_instructor_table()
            self.refresh_instructor_combobox()
            QMessageBox.information(self, 'Success', f'Instructor {name} added successfully!')
        except ValueError as e:
            QMessageBox.critical(self, 'Error', str(e))





[docs]
    def add_course(self):
        course_id = self.course_id_input.text()
        course_name = self.course_name_input.text()
        selected_instructor_name = self.instructor_combobox.currentText()

        selected_instructor = None
        for instructor in self.instructors:
            if instructor.name == selected_instructor_name:
                selected_instructor = instructor
                break

        if not selected_instructor:
            QMessageBox.critical(self, 'Error', 'Please select a valid instructor')
            return

        try:
            course = Course(course_id, course_name, selected_instructor)
            self.courses.append(course)
            selected_instructor.assign_course(course)
            self.refresh_course_table()
            QMessageBox.information(self, 'Success', f'Course {course_name} added successfully!')
        except ValueError as e:
            QMessageBox.critical(self, 'Error', str(e))





[docs]
    def refresh_student_table(self):
        self.student_table.setRowCount(len(self.students))
        for row, student in enumerate(self.students):
            self.student_table.setItem(row, 0, QTableWidgetItem(student.name))
            self.student_table.setItem(row, 1, QTableWidgetItem(str(student.age)))
            self.student_table.setItem(row, 2, QTableWidgetItem(student.get_email()))
            self.student_table.setItem(row, 3, QTableWidgetItem(student.student_id))
            courses = ", ".join([course.course_name for course in student.registered_courses])
            self.student_table.setItem(row, 4, QTableWidgetItem(courses))





[docs]
    def refresh_instructor_table(self):
        self.instructor_table.setRowCount(len(self.instructors))
        for row, instructor in enumerate(self.instructors):
            self.instructor_table.setItem(row, 0, QTableWidgetItem(instructor.name))
            self.instructor_table.setItem(row, 1, QTableWidgetItem(str(instructor.age)))
            self.instructor_table.setItem(row, 2, QTableWidgetItem(instructor.get_email()))
            self.instructor_table.setItem(row, 3, QTableWidgetItem(instructor.instructor_id))





[docs]
    def refresh_course_table(self):
        self.course_table.setRowCount(len(self.courses))
        for row, course in enumerate(self.courses):
            self.course_table.setItem(row, 0, QTableWidgetItem(course.course_id))
            self.course_table.setItem(row, 1, QTableWidgetItem(course.course_name))
            self.course_table.setItem(row, 2, QTableWidgetItem(course.instructor.name))





[docs]
    def refresh_instructor_combobox(self):
        self.instructor_combobox.clear()
        self.instructor_combobox.addItems([instructor.name for instructor in self.instructors])





if __name__ == '__main__':
    app = QApplication(sys.argv)
    window = SchoolManagementGUI()
    window.show()
    sys.exit(app.exec_())
